title: who do u guys think is the strongest lore/in game

replies.body: {{champion:131}} ....definitely not biased cause she's one of my favourite champions.

Lore based... they're pretty equal to be honest. None of them seem to be stronger than the others, their strengths are just different. In game it depends what phase it is. Pre-6, Pantheon has it in the bag, but post-6, I reckon Diana will always have the upper hand. More AP for Diana equates to more damage and more tankiness, whereas Pantheon has to change his build to be tanky and Leona just stuns and really doesn't do much damage.
{{champion:131}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:131}}
I'd say Diana and Leona are on par, while Pantheon is pretty much just a man with no magical powers.
well considering there needs to be 3 maybe 4 champs to defeat 1 champ id say that guy who gona 1v3/1v4
